description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Enjoy an unpredictable, wacky adventure in this turn-based RPG! Crisp graphics, quality music, hilarious dialogue and ridiculous enemies are some of the things that await you in a title that brings the classic gameplay of 8- and 16-bit RPGs into an updated look and feel!
